HelpMessage.Title: Hello fellow wizards! In order to use this bot, you need to use the following commands:
HelpMessage.Description:
1. `/play radio` - Start the radio player.
2. `/play song_title` - Start the song search.
3. `/play url` - Start the url search.
4. `/next` - Skip to the next queue.
5. `/playlist` - Display playlist.
6. `/stop` - Disconnect the bot.
7. `/motivate me` - Get a motivational quote.
8. `/tell joke` - Get a joke.
9. `/help` - Display this message.
